62101.「うむ。待っておったぞ。\n 今回は お前にも 同席してほしかったのだ。\n …:
Mhm. I've been waiting for you. I wanted you
here this time. Now then, let's get started.

62102.「運命を司る 聖なる振り子よ。\n 新たな運命の変異を うながしたまえ……。\n:
Oh, sacred Pendulum of Fate... guide us to a
new destiny, and show us the path we must
take...

62104.「場所は……ソーラリア峡谷か。\n 例の仮面の男も 一緒のようだな……。:
That looks like... Solaria Canyon? The masked
man is with him too...

62106.「いや それよりも 魔元帥ゼルドラドが\n 動き出したということは 大魔王が\n:
But more importantly... the fact that Zeldrad
is on the move means that a full scale
invasion is imminent...

62111.「まったく 軽率な行動を取りおって……。\n いかに 覚醒した勇者でも 魔元帥ゼ:
How rash... no matter strong she thinks she
may be, it's still too dangerous to fight
Zeldrad all by herself.

62112.「<pc>。アンルシアは 逆上して\n トーマのカタキを取ることしか考えていない:
It seems Anlucia's only thought right now is
to avenge Toma. I wasn't expecting her to just
rush off like that.

62113.「ソーラリア峡谷にある\n 古き神の遺跡に向かった 彼女を追って\n どうか 守:
She's headed for the Historic Ruins in
Solaria Canyon. Can you please follow her and
lend her a hand?

62114.「いい返事だ。そなたであれば\n 安心して まかせることができる。:
A good answer. Then I shall leave her in
your care with peace of mind.

62115.「遺跡の中を くまなく探してでも\n アンルシアを 見つけ出すのだ。\n 私も:
You'll have to search every corner of the
ruins to find her. I will come and join you
once I am ready.

62116.「そうだ <pc>。\n 運命の振り子は そなたに返しておこう。:
Here, <pc>. I'll return this to
you.

62117.「結界のチカラが 弱まってきたな。\n そろそろ いいだろう。:
The ward's power is weakening. It's nearly
time.

62119.「……やれやれ。ハエが 舞い込んできたか。:
How unfortunate... a fly found its way in
here.

62121.「ほほう。真の勇者か。\n グランゼドーラ城での戦い以来だな。:
Ho ho... the Hero? It's been some time
since we last spoke...

62122.「あの時とは 違う！\n 今こそ 兄さまのカタキを取ってみせる！:
Things are different now! I will avenge my
brother!

62123.「クックック……。\n なるほどな。確かに あの時とは違うな。\n 覚醒して 少:
Heh, heh... I see... things certainly are
different now. Looks like you've finally
awakened and gained a little more strength.

62124.「……だが それでは わしに勝てんな。: But... that doesn't mean you can defeat me.

62129.「ガルレイよ。勇者の始末は まかせたぞ。\n わしらは 先へ向かう。:
Gullray. Deal with these annoying pests.
We shall go on ahead.

62133.<attr><center><end_attr>ここで 勇者の命運を\n終わらせ: The Hero's destiny cannot end here.

62136.「き…貴様 いったい なにをした！？: Y... you bastard! What the hell was that?!

62137.「……なるほど。勇者の仲間というわけか。: I see... so you are the Hero's companion.

62138.「我は 獣魔将ガルレイ！！\n 大魔王マデサゴーラさまに 忠誠を誓う\n 四魔将:
I am Beast General Gullray, one of the Four
Demon Generals who swear allegiance to
the Great Demon King, Madesagora!

62139.「大魔王さまに たてつく者は\n 皆殺しにしてくれるわ！！:
I'll kill anyone who stands against his
greatness!

62141.「ガルルルガアアアーーーーーッ！！\n なかなか やるようだな！！\n だが そ:
You're not bad, are you! But that will not be
enough to defeat me!

62142.「ちっ。アンルシアを守りながらとなると\n そうカンタンには いかぬな……。:
Damn. Not so easy when you're protecting
Anlucia...

62143.「<cs_pchero>！ ボヤボヤするな！\n 私は アンルシアの守りに専念す:
<cs_pchero>! Stop blabbering on! I will
concentrate on defending Anlucia! I'm leaving
this one to you!

62147.「のんびりしているヒマはないわ。\n 早く ゼルドラドを追わないと……。:
There's no time for rest. We must go after
Zeldrad...

62149.「少しは 自重するのだ。アンルシアよ。\n <cs_pchero>が いなければ:
Take a second to pull yourself together,
Anlucia. If <cs_pchero> hadn't come,
you'd probably be dead right now.

62151.「ところで ふたりに 話があるのだ。\n <cs_pchero>が アンルシアを:
By the way, I need to talk to both of you.
It's about that technique you used to save
Anlucia...

62152.「ルシェンダさま……。\n そのような話をしているヒマは ありません。\n 一刻:
Lushenda, we don't have time to sit around
and talk. We need to go, right now.

62153.「やれやれ……。こりておらぬな……。\n <cs_pchero>。とりあえず 話:
*sigh*... she just can't sit still... Oh,
well. We can talk later. For now, let's
follow behind her.

62154.「覚えておけ <cs_pchero>。\n これからの魔族との戦いは そなたと\:
And don't forget... the cooperation between
you and Anlucia is essential in your fight
against the demons.

62155.「クックック……。やはりな……。\n 悠久の時の間に 神の緋石はチカラを消費し\:
Heh, heh... I knew it. Over time, the Divine
Crimsonite has consumed its power and has
weakened considerably.

62156.「神の緋石さえ破壊してしまえば\n この地は 守りを失い\n 大魔王さまの創りし:
If it is destroyed, this land will lose its
protection. The Great Demon King's false world
shall become one with this world.

62159.「ほお……。ガルレイを倒したか。\n 少しは やるようだな。:
Oh... I see you've defeated Gullray.
How inconvenient...

62160.「クックック……。\n 面白い余興を 思いついたぞ。\n ひとつ この者と戦って:
Keh, heh... here's an interesting idea.
Why don't you battle with my masked friend
here?

62161.「邪魔をするなら 相手になるわよ。: Anyone who gets in my way is my enemy.

62165.「ほお……。これはこれは 見違えたぞ。\n 思った以上に やりおるわ。:
Oh, my... would you look at that. You're doing
better than I expected.

62166.「黙って 見守っているようだが\n 手助けしなくてよいのか？\n 貴様らが協力す:
You two are just going to watch from the
sidelines? Surely the Hero will win if you all
work together, right?

62167.「よく言う……。私たちが スキを見せる瞬間を\n 先ほどから うかがっているクセ:
Well said... you're waiting for us to show you
what we can do? We're not foolish enough
to play your little game.

62168.「……クックック。なるほどな。\n 貴様は なかなか アタマが切れるようだ。:
Keh, heh... I see. Quite the sharp sage,
aren't you?

62173.「……私は 大魔王さまに仕える者。\n お前の兄などではない。:
I am a servant of the Great Demon King. I am
not your brother...

62174.「その男は 大魔王マデサゴーラさまによって\n 黄泉の世界から舞い戻った 闇の勇:
Your brother has been resurrected from the
dead by the Great Demon King... he is now the
Hero of Darkness...

62175.「勇者の持つチカラを欲していた 大魔王さまは\n 小娘……真の勇者である貴様を捕:
The Great Demon King wanted the Hero's power,
and intended to capture you, the true Hero,
and use you as his puppet.

62176.「だが たまたま手に入った代用品でも\n 充分に 役割を果たせることが判明してな:
However... it seems that this substitute will
do just fine. Madesagora is quite pleased
with him.

62178.「クックック……。もう いいだろう。\n トーマよ。使命を果たすのだ。:
Keh, heh... that's enough, Toma.
Finish your mission.

62180.「神の緋石は 砕け散り\n いずれ 侵食が始まる……。:
With the Divine Crimsonite destroyed, the
joining shall begin...

62181.「この地は もはや用済みよな。\n 行くぞ トーマよ。:
This place has served us its purpose.
Toma, let's go.

62183.「やはり いいものだな。 \n 絶望した者のカオを見るというのは……。:
What a wonderful thing... to see a face of
such hopelessness and despair...

62186.「<pc>！ ここは もうダメだ！\n 私は アンルシアを連れて 脱出する！\n:
There's nothing more we can do here! I'll take
her and get out of here. You must escape,
quickly!

62187.「おお。<pc> ごくろうだったな。\n アンルシアも 少しは 落ち着いたようだ:
Thank you for you help, <pc>.
Anlucia seems to have calmed down a bit.

62189.「さて さっそくだが 本題に入ろう。\n これから 重要な話をいくつかする。\n:
I'll get straight to the point. I have a few
important things to tell you, so listen
carefully.

62190.「まず そなたが 獣魔将ガルレイと戦った際に\n アンルシアを守らんと 発動した:
First, about that technique you used to
protect Anlucia from Gullray... it's called
Ally's Protection.

62192.「あの技を使えるということは すなわち\n 勇者を支え 共に戦う存在であることを:
That technique can only be used by someone
who greatly supports the Hero. If you can
use it, then...

62195.「そなたが アンルシアと共に現れた時から\n そうではなかろうかと思っていたが…:
I had a hunch ever since you appeared here
with Anlucia... and it seems my hunch was
correct.

62196.「盟友 <pc>よ。\n これからも アンルシアを支え 共に戦うのだ。\n これ:
<pc>, the ally. You must continue
to support and fight alongside Anlucia. That
is the only way we can hope to win.

62197.「わかったな アンルシア。\n 勇者とは ひとりで戦う者ではない。\n 常に 盟:
Do you understand, Anlucia? A Hero need not
fight alone. Remember, your ally will always
be there to aid you.

62199.「……さて 次の話をするとしよう。\n トーマが破壊した あの石だが\n あれは:
Now, onto the next topic... that stone that
Toma destroyed. It's called the Divine
Crimsonite.

62200.「ゼルドラドの言葉を信じるなら どうやら\n 神の緋石を破壊されると 大魔王によ:
If we are to take Zeldrad's word, the
destruction of the Divine Crimsonite will lead
to further invasion of the false Lendersia.

62201.「では 神の緋石とは なんなのか……。\n くわしくは 古き神の遺跡を研究してい:
What is the Divine Crimsonite, you ask? I've
brought in an expert who studies the Historic
Ruins to explain in more detail.

62203.「この者は ロッサム博士。\n あの古き神の遺跡を研究している学者だ。:
This is Dr. Rossham. He is a scholar who
studies the ruins.

62204.「さあ ロッサム博士。\n 神の緋石について くわしく説明してくれ。:
Now, doctor. Would be so kind as to explain
about the Divine Crimsonite for us?

62205.「か…神の緋石は 人間の神 グランゼニスが\n 自らの血で創りだした レンダーシ:
T..the Divine Crimsonite is said to be the key
to protecting Lendersia from evil. It was
created by Gran Zenith's own blood.

62206.「あの神殿にある 緋石は破壊されましたが\n 神の緋石は レンダーシア内に\n:
The Crimsonite in that temple was
destroyed, but it's said that there exists
four of them, all scattered across Lendersia.

62207.「本来 魔族には触れることすら かないませんが\n 長い歴史の中で チカラは衰え:
Originally, they were untouchable by demons,
but over time, their power waned. Now all
they're able to do is just protect Lendersia.

62209.「ついに 一度衰えた 神の緋石のチカラを\n 復活させる方法が 判明しました！:
At long last, we have figured out how to
restore the power of a Divine Crimsonite once
it has waned!

62210.「それは 勇者姫！\n あなたが持つ 勇者のチカラを\n 神の緋石に 注ぎ込むこ:
It's you, Anlucia! You have the Hero's power,
which can be channeled into the stones!

62211.「さすれば 緋石は たちまち活性化し\n 神代のチカラを取り戻して 何者にも\n:
Your power can instantly restore them to their
divine power, and they'll be completely
indestructible!

62212.「なぜか…… それは 勇者のチカラも また\n グランゼニス神より たまわりし物:
Why, you ask? Well... it's said that the
Hero's power comes straight from Gran Zenith
himself!!

62213.「そこで 勇者姫に お願いがあります！\n あなたの身体は とても興味深い！\n:
Anlucia, I have a favor to ask! Please let me
study your body so that I may examine your
amazing powers!

62214.「ごくろうだったな ロッサム博士よ。\n もう 下がってよいぞ。:
Thank you, doctor. I think that's enough for
now.

62215.「す…すいません。古代史のことになると\n つい 興奮してしまって……。では こ:
I'm...I'm so sorry. I get so excited when it
comes to ancient history... W-well, thank
you for having me.

62216.「さて 今 聞いたとおりだ。そなたたちには\n これから 残り３つの緋石を探しだ:
You now know your next mission. Search for the
remaining three Crimsonites and infuse them
with your power.

62217.「だが そなたたちも 今回の戦いで\n おのれの未熟さを 思い知ったであろう。: However, you must realize your own limits.

62218.「あのゼルドラドを 相手に回して\n 神の緋石を守るためには さらなるチカラを\:
To defend the Divine Crimsonites from Zeldrad,
you must gain more power.

62219.「私は そのための準備をしておく。\n そなたたちは その時にそなえて\n 充分:
I'm fully prepared for what's to come. You
should rest yourselves in preparation.

62220.「ごくろうだったな アンルシアよ。\n もう 下がってよいぞ。:
Sorry to keep you, Anlucia. You may go and
rest now.

62221.「ルシェンダさま。今回の戦いでは\n 大変 ご迷惑をおかけしました。これからは\:
I wanted to apologize for my rash actions. I
will cooperate with <pc> from
here on out.

62222.「<pc>よ。アンルシアを守るという\n 今回の任務を 見事に果たしてくれたな。:
<pc>. You have done an outstanding
job in your mission to protect Anlucia. Please
take this as a reward.

62223.「そうだ。トーマが よみがえったことは\n くれぐれも 他言無用で頼むぞ。\n:
Right. Also, please don't tell anyone about
Toma. The last thing we need is the people
going into a panic.

62224.「なかなか ウデが立つようだな！！\n だが そんな攻撃では 我は倒せんぞ！！:
You're a very skilled fighter! But such an
attack will not defeat me!

62225.なんと 獣魔将ガルレイのキズが\n見る見るうちに 回復していく！:
Beast General Gullray's wounds quickly
recovered!

62226.「ガルルルガアアアーーーーーッ！！\n 我は 大魔王マデサゴーラさまから\n 無:
Gehehehe! I have been given an invincible body
by the Great Demon King Madesagora!

62227.「決して滅びぬ この身体がある限り\n 貴様らごときに 敗れはせぬ！！:
As long as I have this invincible body, I will
never be defeated by the likes of you!

62228.「そうか……。\n 大魔王の加護を得た 魔族は\n 通常の攻撃では 倒せないのだ:
I see... A demon who has the Great Demon
King's blessing can't be defeated by ordinary
attacks...

62230.「<cs_pchero>……。今よ。\n 偽の世界で 魔勇者を倒した時と同じよう:
<cs_pchero>... now. We will join forces just
as we did when we defeated the hero in the
false world.

62231.「私が 勇者のチカラを高めるまで\n 化け物の相手を お願い……。:
Until I can raise the power of the hero, I
need you to deal with the monster...

80320.「ふむ……。どうやら 峡谷の奥地にある\n 古き神の遺跡に 向かっているようだな:
Hmm... it looks as if they're headed towards
the Historic Ruins deep within the canyon.
What could they be after...?

80321.「のんびりと構えている時間は ないな。\n 何か 対策を講じねば……。:
We can't just sit around and wait for
something to happen. We need to act...

81343.「魔元帥ゼルドラド……\n 絶対に……絶対に 許さない……！:
Zeldrad... I will never... EVER... forgive
you...!

81344.「ルシェンダさま！\n 私は これから 勇者として\n 悪しき魔族どもを 討伐し:
Lushenda! As the Hero, it's my duty to go
and stop those evil demons!

81345.<pc>は 賢者ルシェンダから\n運命の振り子（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<:
<pc> received
the Pendulum of Fate (Key Item) from Sage
Lushenda!<me 60>

81346.「それでは アンルシアの件。\n くれぐれも よろしく頼むぞ。<pc>。:
As for Anlucia... I'm counting on you to take
good care of her.

81347.「いい返事だ。そなたであれば\n 安心して まかせることができる。:
A good answer. Then I shall leave her in
your care with peace of mind.

81348.「……だが そなたは 頼まれごとを\n 抱えすぎているようだ。すみやかに手を空け:
...But it seems you have too many requests.
So, relieve yourself and come back as soon as
you can. Please.

81349.「この緊急時に断るとは 何事だ！\n 私を失望させないでくれ <pc>！:
You'd refuse me in this situation?! I'm asking
you not to disappoint me!
